english_forum.title: Deep Recon (Claude Skill for Obsidian)
english_forum.author: kazys
english_forum.content_html:
**** Beware, this can burn tokens ****

I created a new, utterly experimental skill for (max) subscribers of Claude to use within Obsidian. It’s /deep-recon. Where Deep Research focuses in on one vector, Deep Recon goes out to look for new ideas both in your vault and on the net.

This is a multi-agent skill.

Four agents - Explorer, Associator, Critic, Synthesizer - run in parallel rounds. The Explorer casts a wide net across the web and your notes. The Associator finds structural parallels you hadn’t seen. The Critic stress-tests everything. The Synthesizer maps the territory: not one answer, but competing framings and the tensions between them. The work ok.

The output is an Obsidian-native document structured around 3-5 competing framings of your topic. The goal is to broaden perspectives about a topic.

Go to GitHub - kvarnelis/deep-recon: Multi-agent reconnaissance skill for Claude Code + Obsidian for the skill. Drop the deep-recon folder into claude/skills/ and invoke it with /deep-recon

It needs Opus model access - the Synthesizer does the hardest integrative work and needs the headroom. And, of course, it needs to have access to the net as well as an Obsidian instance with some version of the Claude code installed.

A two-round session runs roughly 800k-1M tokens across all agents and takes 20-30 minutes.

So far, I’ve been a little surprised by some of the inferences Claude has drawn, positively of course.
english_forum.ai_summary: 多智能体并联挖掘笔记库，打破单一视角局限
english_forum.ai_pain_point: 写作或研究思路卡壳，难以跳出既有思维框架，忽略笔记库中隐含的深层关联
ai_highlights: 挖掘笔记库和网络资源，解决缺乏灵感时的思路枯竭
发现跨领域的结构平行点，在分析主题时打破学科壁垒
生成多视角竞争框架，在深度思考时拓宽认知边界
english_forum.ai_comment: 只要你的钱包够厚，这确实是个烧钱换灵感的神器；穷学生慎入，小心余额蒸发

github_opened.title: Add plugin: Doodle
github_opened.author: alexsussy
github_opened.body:
# I am submitting a new Community Plugin

- [x] I attest that I have done my best to deliver a high-quality plugin, am proud of the code I have written, and would recommend it to others. I commit to maintaining the plugin and being responsive to bug reports. If I am no longer able to maintain it, I will make reasonable efforts to find a successor maintainer or withdraw the plugin from the directory.

## Repo URL

<!--- Paste a link to your repo here for easy access -->
Link to my plugin: https://github.com/alexsussy/obsidian-doodle

## Release Checklist
- [x] I have tested the plugin on
  - [x]  Windows
  - [x]  macOS
  - [ ]  Linux
  - [ ]  Android _(if applicable)_
  - [x]  iOS _(if applicable)_
- [x] My GitHub release contains all required files (as individual files, not just in the source.zip / source.tar.gz)
  - [x] `main.js`
  - [x] `manifest.json`
  - [x] `styles.css` _(optional)_
- [x] GitHub release name matches the exact version number specified in my manifest.json (_**Note:** Use the exact version number, don't include a prefix `v`_)
- [x] The `id` in my `manifest.json` matches the `id` in the `community-plugins.json` file.
- [x] My README.md describes the plugin's purpose and provides clear usage instructions.
- [x] I have read the developer policies at https://docs.obsidian.md/Developer+policies, and have assessed my plugin's adherence to these policies.
- [x] I have read the tips in https://docs.obsidian.md/Plugins/Releasing/Plugin+guidelines and have self-reviewed my plugin to avoid these common pitfalls.
- [x] I have added a license in the LICENSE file.
- [x] My project respects and is compatible with the original license of any code from other plugins that I'm using.
      I have given proper attribution to these other projects in my `README.md`.
github_opened.ai_summary: 笔记内直接手绘批注，告别切换应用截图的繁琐。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 想在文中圈出重点或画简单示意图时，必须打开外部画图工具再截图。
ai_highlights: 无需切换应用，直接在笔记界面上快速涂鸦标记重点。
适合记录思维碎片，用简单的线条替代冗长的文字描述。
保持笔记上下文连贯，无需管理繁琐的外部图片文件。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于有个不折腾的画笔了，虽然比不上 Excalidraw 强大，但胜在随手能用。

github_opened.ai_pain_point: 引用古兰经时需反复在浏览器或书籍与笔记间切换，手动复制粘贴且格式混乱

为经文研究者提供在笔记软件中直接调用经典的功能
github_opened.ai_comment: 一看测试清单只勾了macOS，Windows和Linux用户直接在门外吃灰吧。

github_opened.ai_summary: 告别移动端输入痛点，工具栏一键触发常用指令。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 手机端打字时，频繁下拉命令面板或通过多级菜单查找指令，导致思路中断且操作繁琐。
ai_highlights: 移动端自定义屏幕按钮，无需层层菜单直达核心指令。
适用于手机记录场景，将繁琐指令转化为单次触控。
告别手机端操作割裂感，手指不离屏幕即可连续编辑。
github_opened.ai_comment: 还在手机上对着那个磨叽的命令栏叹气？装了这个，你的大拇指会感谢你。

github_opened.ai_comment: 名字听着像物理治疗，实则是元数据强迫症的止痛药，谁手改YAML谁知道。

github_opened.ai_pain_point: 需频繁在网页版 Claude 和笔记间复制粘贴，打断写作心流且无法利用上下文。

内嵌侧边栏实时对话，处理选中文本时无需切换窗口，保持专注。
接入 Claude 原生模型，发挥其长文本处理优势，轻松润色长文或生成代码。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于不用在浏览器和 Obsidian 之间左右横跳了，把脑子外包给 Claude 算正经事。

github_opened.ai_pain_point: 厌倦了枯燥的列表和混乱的图谱，希望以更有空间感和结构化的方式整理知识
ai_highlights: 将笔记转化为空间地图，梳理复杂层级时，通过拖拽实现直观布局。
可视化笔记间的物理关联，查找相关内容时，利用地块相邻关系快速定位。
用游戏化方式提升整理愉悦感，厌倦传统列表时，赋予知识库领地建设感。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于有人把知识库变成了《文明》的地图编辑器，小心整理笔记上头导致忘记正事。

github_opened.title: Add Flux plugin for vault synchronization
github_opened.author: Xepheryy
github_opened.body:
Flux syncs a configurable vault folder to a Flux server that the user runs or trusts (self‑hosted or their own host). Authentication is handled by the reverse proxy (e.g. Caddy). The plugin only talks to the endpoint URL the user configures; no data is sent to third parties.

# I am submitting a new Community Plugin

- [x] I attest that I have done my best to deliver a high-quality plugin, am proud of the code I have written, and would recommend it to others. I commit to maintaining the plugin and being responsive to bug reports. If I am no longer able to maintain it, I will make reasonable efforts to find a successor maintainer or withdraw the plugin from the directory.

      I have given proper attribution to these other projects in my `README.md`.
github_opened.ai_summary: 数据绝不入第三方库，自建服务器同步笔记。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 担心官方或第三方SaaS同步服务窥探隐私，且不愿在插件内明文存储账号密码。
ai_highlights: 数据主权完全回归，自建服务器彻底杜绝第三方窥探隐私。
反向代理搞定认证，无需在插件内直接存账号更安全。
精准同步指定目录，避免无关配置文件污染你的服务器。
github_opened.ai_comment: 这是给“数据洁癖”患者准备的良药，但前提是你得先学会当网管。

github_opened.title: Add plugin: Embed Skipper
github_opened.author: ocapraro
github_opened.body:
# I am submitting a new Community Plugin

- [X] I attest that I have done my best to deliver a high-quality plugin, am proud of the code I have written, and would recommend it to others. I commit to maintaining the plugin and being responsive to bug reports. If I am no longer able to maintain it, I will make reasonable efforts to find a successor maintainer or withdraw the plugin from the directory.

## Repo URL

<!--- Paste a link to your repo here for easy access -->
Link to my plugin: [https://github.com/ocapraro/obsidian-embed-skipper](https://github.com/ocapraro/obsidian-embed-skipper)

## Release Checklist
- [ ] I have tested the plugin on
  - [X]  Windows
  - [X]  macOS
  - [X]  Linux
  - [ ]  Android _(if applicable)_
  - [X]  iOS _(if applicable)_
- [X] My GitHub release contains all required files (as individual files, not just in the source.zip / source.tar.gz)
  - [X] `main.js`
  - [X] `manifest.json`
  - [X] `styles.css` _(optional)_
- [X] GitHub release name matches the exact version number specified in my manifest.json (_**Note:** Use the exact version number, don't include a prefix `v`_)
- [X] The `id` in my `manifest.json` matches the `id` in the `community-plugins.json` file.
- [X] My README.md describes the plugin's purpose and provides clear usage instructions.
- [X] I have read the developer policies at https://docs.obsidian.md/Developer+policies, and have assessed my plugin's adherence to these policies.
- [X] I have read the tips in https://docs.obsidian.md/Plugins/Releasing/Plugin+guidelines and have self-reviewed my plugin to avoid these common pitfalls.
- [X] I have added a license in the LICENSE file.
- [X] My project respects and is compatible with the original license of any code from other plugins that I'm using.
      I have given proper attribution to these other projects in my `README.md`.
github_opened.ai_summary: 嵌入时剔除标题块，让跨文档引用内容更纯粹。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 嵌入包含YAML标题块或开篇语的笔记时，预览区显示冗余信息导致界面杂乱。
ai_highlights: 嵌入笔记时自动忽略前几行，避免标题块干扰阅读体验。
自定义需跳过的行数，精准控制引用内容的起始位置。
省去手动复制粘贴或编辑原文件的麻烦，保持笔记整洁。
github_opened.ai_comment: 终于不用把别人的日记头（标题块）也嵌进来了，强迫症狂喜。

github_opened.ai_summary: 把 Momentum 仪表盘搬进 Obsidian，启动即见每日重点。
github_opened.ai_pain_point: 打开软件不知道先读哪篇笔记，缺乏明确的启动仪式感，容易被海量信息淹没。
ai_highlights: 启动时强制设定每日焦点，防止打开笔记库后盲目漫游。
提供全屏仪表盘与问候语，填补启动时的枯燥等待时间。
模仿 Momentum 浏览器首页，为你创造沉下心来的仪式感。
github_opened.ai_comment: 把浏览器的新标签页生搬硬套进来，但对于注意力涣散的用户来说，这种“强制聚焦”或许正好够用。

ai.overview: 今天 Obsidian 简直是 AI 的修罗场！Deep Recon 和 Claude Code Copilot 让笔记库彻底“成精”，多智能体并联简直让人上瘾。玩腻了文字？Hex Cartographer 直接带你玩 RPG 地图。终于可以告别手机端手残，Quick Actions 和 Doodle 让你随手记。Obsidanki 帮你懒人做卡片，Momentum 带你假装高效，Embed Skipper 让嵌入更纯粹。这一天，你的效率要起飞，硬盘又要不够用了！
